name: Slumber Party Panic
description: Princess Bumblegum's latest experiment accidentally unleashes an undead horde upon the Candy Kingdom.

name: Trouble in Lumpy Space
description: Jake is bitten by Lumpy Space Princess and begins to transform into a Lumpy being. In order to find a cure, Finn is travels to Lumpy Space.

name: Prisoners of Love
description: After the Ice King kidnaps a large group of princesses, its up to Finn and Jake to free them.

name: Tree Trunks
description: Tree Trunks joins Finn and Jake on an quest, but finds her talents for adventuring leave something to be desired.

name: The Enchiridion!
description: Princess Bubblegum sends Finn on his most challenging quest yet--to recover The Enchiridion, the hero's handbook.

name: The Jiggler
description: After finding a Jiggler in the wild, Finn and Jake decide to adopt the funny creature as a pet.

name: Ricardio the Heart Guy
description: A new stranger arrives in the Candy Kingdom: a charismatic talking heart named Ricardio. He soon becomes very popular, except to Finn who believes he's hiding something.

name: Business Time
description: Finn and Jake discover a tribe of businessmen frozen in a block of ice and hire them to make adventuring easier.

name: My Two Favorite People
description: Jake tries hanging out with both his best friend, Finn, and his girlfriend, Lady Rainicorn, at the same time. But soon Jake becomes jealous when Finn and Lady seem too friendly.

name: Memories of Boom Boom Mountain
description: While having trouble solving the contradictory problems of the residents of a mountain village, Finn recalls where he found the desire to help people.

name: Wizard
description: Finn and Jake discover a secret tribe of wizards and take magic lessons for a price they aren't prepared to pay.

name: Evicted!
description: After Marceline the Vampire Queen visits Finn and Jake at their tree fort she informs them that she is moving in and kicking them out.

name: City of Thieves
description: A mission leads Jake into a city where everyone is a thief and the chance to be corrupted is incredibly strong.

name: The Witch's Garden
description: A witch steals Jake's shape-shifting powers, but his ego makes getting them back very difficult.

name: What is Life?
description: Finn creates a robot to continuously throw pies at Jake but unexpectedly imbues it with a soul.

name: Ocean of Fear
description: Finn must overcome his fear of the ocean.

name: When Wedding Bells Thaw
description: The Ice King announces that he is engaged and to the shock of Finn and Jake it seems the bride is actually willing. But will the Ice King give up his princess kidnapping ways?

name: Dungeon
description: Finn adventures into a forbidden dungeon, against the wishes of Princess Bumblegum and Jake, and finds more than he bargained for.

name: The Duke
description: An accident in the Candy Kingdom which Finn and Jake cause is blamed on the Duke of Nuts. Finn and Jake, however, find admitting the truth to be harder and harder as time passes.

name: Freak City
description: A trickster turns Finn into a giant foot.

name: Donny
description: Finn and Jake try to reform a bullying ogre, but realize that their good deed has unexpected consequences.

name: Henchman
description: Marceline the Vampire Queen tricks Finn into swearing allegiance to her.

name: Rainy Day Daydream
description: Jake's imagination literally runs wild, coming to life and bringing many dangers into the tree house.

name: What Have You Done?
description: After being told to arrest the Ice King, Finn and Jake face an ethical quandary when they realize the villain has not actually committed any recent crimes.

name: His Hero
description: Finn meets his hero, the great warrior Billy, who is not everything Finn expected him to be.

name: Gut Grinder
description: Jake is accused of being a horrible monster that has been terrorizing the locals. Soon, Jake himself is unsure if he is or isn't the monster.

name: It Came from the Nightosphere
description: Finn summons the Lord of Evil to reconcile with his daughter, Marceline the Vampire Queen, but ends up unleashing him of the unsuspecting land.

name: The Eyes
description: Because of a creepy horse outside their window, Finn and Jake cannot get any sleep.

name: Loyalty to the King
description: After shaving, the Ice King is mistaken as a good guy and takes advantage of the situation.

name: Blood Under the Skin
description: Finn is made fun of by a group of knights and reacts by questing for a set of magical armor that will earn him respect.

name: Storytelling
description: Unable to give a sick Jake an entertaining story, Finn sets off into the woods to discover a true story.

name: Slow Love
description: Finn and Jake try to find a girlfriend for a giant snail so that it will stop wrecking their tree-house.

name: Power Animal
description: Finn is kidnapped, but Jake's short attention span means rescue is dubious.

name: Crystals Have Power
description: Jake swears a life of non-violence right before a race of indestructible crystal-men abduct Finn to another

name: The Other Tarts
description: Finn and Jake are given one of the highest responsibilities: transporting and guarding the rarest pastry in the Candy Kingdom.

name: To cut a woman's hair
description: An evil witch threatens to crush Jake to death if Finn doesn't deliver her the hair of a princess.

name: The Chamber of Frozen Blades
description: While he's away, Finn and Jake sneak into Ice King's fortress.

name: Her Parents
description: Anxious about meeting Lady Rainicorn's parents, Jake tries to pass himself off as a Rainicorn.

name: The Pods
description: Given the duty of protecting three magic beans, one evil and two good, Finn and Jake decide to plant them to find out which is which.

name: The Silent King
description: After defeating their king, Finn becomes the new ruler of the Goblin people, and finds that their strange ways are too difficult to understand.

name: The Real You
description: Nervous about giving a speech at Princess Bubblegum's science conference and barbecue, Finn finds a magical pair of glasses that make him the smartest being in the land.

name: Guardians of Sunshine
description: Finn and Jake become trapped inside one of BMO's video game creations.

name: Death in Bloom
description: lant, Finn and Jake travel to the land of the dead to bring it back to life.

name: Susan Strong
description: Having always believed he is the only human left in the Land of Ooo, Finn believes he has discovered a tribe to primitive humans living underground.

name: Mystery Train
description: While traveling on a train, Finn and Jake find themselves in the middle of a murder mystery.

name: Go With Me
description: Jake and Marceline give Finn conflicting advise on how to ask out Princess Bubblegum.

name: Belly of the Beast
description: Finn and Jake must save a group of clueless, party-minded teddy bears living inside the belly of a monster.

name: The Limit
description: An enormous maze tests the limit of Jake's stretching power.

name: Video Makers
description: Finn and Jake set out to make their own movie, but have conflicting visions of what their movie should be.

name: Mortal Folly
description: The Lich, the greatest form of pure evil in the land of Ooo, is accidentally unleashed. With the highest stakes, Finn and Jake set out on the most serious adventure of their career.

name: Mortal Recoil
description: With the evil Lich seemingly defeated, Finn and Jake are uneasy with their success because of its great cost.

name: Heat Signature
description: Finn and Jake ask Marceline the Vampire Queen to turn them into vampires. However, she isn't interested in transforming her friends and tricks them into thinking she has.

name: Conquest of Cuteness
description: Finn and Jake come under attack in their home from a race of super-evil creatures which are too cute to be taken seriously.

name: Morituri te Salutamus
description: Finn and Jake end up in a haunted arena where they must fight ghost gladiators to escape.

name: Memory of a Memory
description: Finding their friend, Marceline the Vampire Queen, in a deep sleep, a mysterious stranger helps Finn and Jake by sending them into her dreams to awaken her.

name: Hitman
description: The Ice King looks to hire a professional bully to beat up Finn and Jake, but inadvertently hires a deadly, unstoppable contract killer.

name: Too Young
description: Finn is happy that Princess Bubblegum has regressed to the same age as him. But soon a challenger for the throne arrives to unseat the newly underage princess.

name: The Monster
description: The king and queen of Lumpy Space ask Finn to find and return Lumpy Space Princess, who has been living in the woods and mistaken as a monster.

name: Still
description: The Ice King uses a potion that paralyzes Finn and Jake, who become the lonely villain's unwilling best friends.

name: Wizard Battle
description: The Ice King enters a battle of wizards from all over the Land of Ooo, to win a kiss from Princess Bubblegum--which Finn and Jake look to prevent.

name: Fionna and Cake
description: In a world where all the characters are different genders, the adventurer Fionna gets advice from her cat-friend Cake on her date with Prince Gumball.

name: What Was Missing
description: In order to open a magic door filled with stolen items, Finn and all his friends must perform in a band. But everyone's differing musical tastes and overall tensions make things difficult.

name: Apple Thief
description: After Tree Trunks finds her apples have gone missing, Finn and Jake search the criminal underworld of the Candy Kingdom to recover them.

name: The Creeps
description: Finn's masquerade birthday party turns into a deadly mystery.

name: From Bad to Worse
description: The undead plague returns to the Candy Kingdom.

name: Beautopia
description: Susan Strong returns and asks Finn and Jake to save her people from the Glubs. But Finn is still not sure if he can trust her after last time.

name: No One Can Hear You
description: After trying to stop a deer that has been licking the Candy Kingdom people, Finn wakes up in a hospital to find everyone missing except Jake who is acting very strange.

name: Jake vs. Me-Mow
description: A tiny cat assassin tries to black mail Jake into killing someone, by hiding in his nose with some poison.

name: Thank You
description: A fire-breathing wolf cub becomes lost in the snowy woods and becomes unlikely friends with a tall snow-creature.

name: The New Frontier
description: Jake has a dream that seems to foretell his death but, to Finn's dismay, doesn't take it serious.

name: Holly Jolly Secrets, Part I
description: In part one of the holiday special, The Ice King tries to get his video diary back from Finn and Jake.

name: Holly Jolly Secrets, Part II
description: In part two of the holiday special, Finn and Jake discover that the Ice King is named Simon and has a secret past.

name: Marceline's Closet
description: Bored waiting for her, Finn and Jake sneak into Marceline's house, become trapped when she comes home, and witness her strange behavior when she's alone.

name: Paper Pete
description: A secret war takes place in the library between tiny paper people and mold creatures, and Finn is brought into the middle of it all.

name: Another Way
description: Finn journeys for a cyclops's magical tears to cure his injuries, but have trouble because of his stubborn inability to follow the advice of others.

name: Ghost Princess
description: Finn and Jake try to help Ghost Princess by solving her murder.

name: Dad's Dungeon
description: Finn and Jake discover a lost message from their dad which sends them to a mysterious and dangerous dungeon.

name: Incendium
description: Trying to help Finn get over his hopeless feelings for Princess Bubblegum, Jake sets out to find a new princess for Finn to go out with.

name: Hot to the Touch
description: Refusing to believe that she is evil, Finn tries to win over his new crush, Flame Princess.

name: Five Short Graybles
description: Five short stories of Finn, Jake and their friends.

name: Web Weirdos
description: After being caught by a giant spider, Finn and Jake try and help the arachnid with its marital problems so they won't be eaten.

name: Dream of Love
description: Tree Trunks finds love but her public displays of affection nauseate everyone around her.

name: Return to the Nightosphere
description: Finn and Jake find themselves imprisoned in the dark realm of the Nightosphere with no memory of how they came to be there.

name: Daddy's Little Monster
description: Continuing their mysterious quest in the Nightosphere, Finn and Jake must rescue their friend Marceline the Vampire Queen.

name: In Your Footsteps
description: A cute, bumbling bear begins to follow and mimic Finn. At first Finn enjoys having the furry admirer, but soon becomes uneasy with the bear's devotion.

name: Hug Wolf
description: A Hug Wolf, a monstrous wolf that gives hugs against the will of its victims, turns Finn into one of its kind.

name: Princess Monster Wife
description: The Ice King steals various body parts from all the princesses to construct his own perfect princess bride.

name: Goliad
description: Princess Bubblegum uses her own DNA to create an intelligent and immortal sphinx which is planned to one day succeed her to the throne, except that Finn and Jake accidentally affect those plans.

name: Beyond this Earthly Realm
description: A magic curse turns Finn into a ghost, invisible to everyone but the Ice King.

name: Gotcha!
description: Lumpy Space Princess sets out to write a book on how to catch a man and goes undercover as Finn and Jake's secretary in order to seduce Finn.

name: Princess Cookie
description: The Candy Kingdom faces a hostage crisis from a cookie that demands Princess Bubblegum's crown.

name: Card Wars
description: As Finn joins in on Jake's favorite, hyper-complicated card game, emotions and poor gamesmanship run high.

name: Sons of Mars
description: Magic Man switches bodies with Jake so that he can escape his trial on Mars, leaving it up to Finn to reveal the truth and save his friend.

name: Burning Low
description: Finn and Flame Princess cautiously begin a relationship as boyfriend and girlfriend, of which Princess Bubblegum disapproves.

name: BMO Noire
description: BMO uses hard-boiled detective skills to locate Finn's missing sock.

name: King Worm
description: Finn finds himself trapped in a bizarre dream, the outcome of which may determine if he ever wakes up.

name: Lady & Peebles
description: Princess Bubblegum and Lady Rainicorn must rescue Finn and Jake.

name: You Made Me
description: The would-be usurper to the throne, Lemongrab, returns to the Candy Kingdom, demanding volunteer subjects for his own kingdom.

name: Who Would Win
description: While training for an epic battle, Finn and Jake take their frustrations out in a fight against each other.

name: Ignition Point
description: Finn and Jake sneak into the Fire Kingdom to retrieve some of Flame Princess' things, and stumble onto a plot to kill the Flame King.

name: The Hard Easy
description: A tribe of swamp creatures ask Finn and Jake to save them from a Mega Frog.

name: Reign of Gunters
description: While the Ice King is away, his sidekick Gunther the penguin uses a magic amulet to conquer the countryside and attack the Candy Kingdom.

name: I Remember You
description: The Ice King asks Marceline to help him write a song.

name: The Lich
description: Finn has an unclear premonition involving The Lich and sets out to stop the undead creature.

name: Finn the Human
description: Finn's wish to stop the evil Lich has massive cosmic consequences.

name: Jake the Dog
description: Following the unexpected consequences of Finn's cosmic wish it's up to the Jake -- and his short attention span -- to set things right.

name: Five More Short Graybles
description: Five more short stories with one connecting theme.

name: Up a Tree
description: Having been magical shrunk to the size of a forest animal, Finn takes up a quest to climb a tree and retrieve his lost flying disc.

name: All the Little People
description: Finn receives a mysterious bag that contains what appears to be living toys of everyone he knows, which playing with has unexpected results.

name: Jake the Dad
description: Lady gives birth to a litter of puppies and Jake becomes an eager but frantic father.

name: Davey
description: Finn becomes Davey, an alter-ego, everyday man in order to escape the attention of fame and becomes consumed by his new identity.

name: Mystery Dungeon
description: Ice King, Neptr, Tree Trunks, Shelby and Lemongrab wake up in a dungeon and must work together to escape.

name: All Your Fault
description: Lemongrab sends a distress message to the Candy Kingdom which Finn and Jake respond to.

name: Little Dude
description: Finn's hat comes to life.

name: Bad Little
description: A return to the gender-swapped world with Fionna and Cake and Marshall Lee the Vampire King.

name: Vault of Bones
description: Finn and Flame Princess explore a dungeon together.

name: The Great Bird Human
description: Finn and Jake get lost in the badlands and are saved by Xergiok, ex-Goblin King who now lives in a cave. A look at what Ice King and Marceline were like 996 years ago.

name: Simon and Marcy
description: Marceline tells Finn and Jake about her and Ice King's past, 996 years ago.

name: A Glitch is a Glitch
description: Ice King creates a computer virus to delete everybody except him and Princess Bubblegum. Stuck inside the treehouse during a sword storm, Jake builds a pillow fort while Finn goes to a different world.

name: Puhoy
description: Depressed by his feelings with Flame Princess, Finn enters a pillow fort where he enters a new world and makes a new life for himself.

name: BMO Lost
description: BMO gets snatched away by a giant eagle and must find his way home.

name: Princess Potluck
description: Ice King does everything possible to ruin a princess potluck he believes he didn't get invited to.

name: James Baxter the Horse
description: Finn and Jake meet a horse with the power to make sad people happy.

name: Shh!
description: Finn and Jake hold a contest to see who can last longer without talking.

name: The Suitor
description: Peppermint Butler thinks Princess Bubblegum is spending too much time in her lab and decides she needs a suitor.

name: The Party's Over, Isla de Señorita
description: After becoming tired of always losing to Finn and Jake and failing to win Princess Bubblegum's love, Ice King decides to throw in the towel.

name: One Last Job
description: Jake Jr. gets mixed up with some bad eggs, and Jake reunites with his old gang to save her.

name: Another Five More Short Graybles
description: Lumpy Space Princess is robbed and faints before she can tell Finn and Jake who robbed her.

name: Candy Streets
description: Princess Bubblegum believes magic is nothing but a bunch of hooey until Starchy gets sick.

name: Wizards Only, Fools
description: Jake is sick and tired of Finn using his body as a suit of armor.

name: Jake Suit
description: Finn and Jake disguise themselves as MOs in order to infiltrate the MO factory.

name: Be More
description: Finn and Jake disguise themselves as MOs in order to infiltrate the MO factory.

name: Sky Witch
description: Princess Bubblegum and Marceline team up to reclaim lost property.

name: Frost & Fire
description: After Flame Princess battles Ice King, Finn has an exciting dream.

name: Too Old
description: Finn and Princess Bubblegum discover a talented lemon citizen named Lemonhope while on a diplomatic trip to Castle Lemongrab; also, something strange is happening to the Earls of Lemongrab, leading to their society crumbling.

name: Earth & Water
description: Princess Bubblegum subjects Flame Princess to a series of tests to gauge Fire Princess' fiery tendencies.

name: Time Sandwich
description: Jake crafts the most delicious sandwich ever.

name: The Vault
description: Jake and BMO help Finn tap into his repressed memories to uncover a secret past.

name: Love Games
description: Slime Princess needs a husband or else she'll lose the Slime Kingdom to her obnoxious sister.

name: Dungeon Train
description: Finn and Jake discover a train where every car is a dungeon filled with a new foe for Finn to fight.

name: Box Prince
description: Finn meets the Box Prince (a cat with a box on its back) and discovers the Box Kingdom has been taken over by an impostor.

name: Red Starved
description: Finn, Jake and Marceline become trapped underground. Starving for anything red Marceline begins to lose control and turns her eyes to Finn and Jake's blood.

name: We Fixed a Truck
description: Finn and Jake find a broken down pickup truck and enlist the help of BMO and Banana Man to fix it.

name: Play Date
description: Sick and tired of babysitting Ice King while the Ice Kingdom is being rebuilt, Finn and Jake call up an old friend to hang out with their annoying houseguest: Abracadaniel. But when Ice King and his new BFF accidentally unleash the demon Kee-Oth, Finn and Jake have to clean up their mess.

name: The Pit
description: Kee-Oth the Blood Demon has kidnapped Jake, taken him back to his dimension and thrown him in a pit. If Finn wants to rescue his friend, he's going to need Lady Rainicorn's help... and a videotape that will reveal how to open the portal to Kee-Oth's messed-up dimension.

name: James
description: Finn and Jake accompany Princess Bubblegum on her study of the Desert of Wonders. However, they are soon attacked by goo monsters, and Finn and Jake think that Bubblegum's robot helper James is to blame.

name: Root Beer Guy
description: Root beer guy must put aside his common everyday life to search for the truth behind the murders, lies, and deceit in the Candy Kingdom.

name: Apple Wedding
description: Tree Trunks and Mr. Pig are getting married.

name: Blade of Grass
description: Finn gets a new sword.

name: Rattleballs
description: Finn meets an old robot in the junkyard who promises to make Finn into a master swordsman.

name: The Red Throne
description: The Fire King and Don John the Flame Lord take over the Fire Kingdom. Now Flame Princess must use Finn's and Cinnamon Bun's help to get it back.

name: Betty
description: The Ice King loses his powers, reverts to his old human-self, and begins to wither away due to being over a thousand years old.

name: Bad Timing
description: Bubblegum Princess invents a time travel sphere that Lumpy Space Princess wants for solving her relationship problems.

name: Lemonhope Part One
description: Young Lemonhope leaves the candy kingdom after a deep desire to be free of all responsibilities grips him. So he ventures out on his own with nothing more than a lute and hope to find freedom.

name: Lemonhope Part Two
description: Lemonhope meets an adventurer who teaches him true freedom. But even with his new life of freedom he is plagued with dreams of his lemon kingdom and his family being imprisoned.

name: Billy's Bucket List
description: Finn meets Billy's ex-girlfriend, Canyon, who finds Billy's bucket list. Finn vows to complete it for his late hero.

name: Wake Up
description: Finn tracks down who he believes is his father.

name: Escape from the Citadel
description: Finn finds his long-lost father after following the Lich to the Citadel. As it turns out, maybe this wasn't such a good idea?

name: James II
description: 'James', Finn & Jake, and Princess Bubblegum discover that James has been cloned 25 times, and that the original zombie James is returning - and not in a good way.

name: The Tower
description: Finn decides to build a tower to space.

name: Sad Face
description: Once a month, while Finn and Jake are asleep, Jake's tail comes to life. It travels to a little circus in the forest, where it is known as Blue Nose the sad faced clown. But Blue Nose and the ringmaster come to a disagreement regarding the treatment of the 'beast' Goralina.

name: Breezy
description: In an attempt to help his wilting arm-flower, Finn begins a search for smooches with the help of a friendly bee named Breezy.

name: Food Chain
description: Finn and Jake learn how the food chain works with a little help from Magic Man.

name: Furniture & Meat
description: Finn and Jake spend all their money.

name: The Prince Who Wanted Everything
description: Back to the Fiona and Cake universe when LSP wants the Ice King to tell (her) version of Lumpy Space Prince's life, but she has an ulterior motive.

name: Something Big
description: The Sky Witch attacks the Candy Kingdom.

name: Little Brother
description: Shelby gains a little brother who sets off to battle.

name: Ocarina
description: Shelby gains a little brother who sets off to battle.

name: Thanks for the Crabapples, Giuseppe
description: Ice King goes on a spiritual journey.

name: Princess Day
description: Marceline and Lumpy Space Princess cause chaos at the Breakfast Kingdom.

name: Nemesis
description: A crusader against the dark arts seeks to banish Peppermint Butler.

name: Joshua and Margaret Investigations
description: Jake tells the story of his and his brother Jermaine's' births.

name: Ghost Fly
description: Jake kills a fly that gets into his soup. However, he and Finn must get creative when the fly returns as a powerful ghost to haunt them.

name: Everything's Jake
description: Jake is transported to a different world.

name: Is That You?
description: After the death of Prismo, Finn and Jake do a funeral ritual. But when Jake eats the last pickle of the jar of pickles that Prismo made for him, he is transported to Prismo's lair. Will Finn be able to save him?

name: Jake the Brick
description: Jake is conducting an experiment of being a brick in a brick-shack.

name: Dentist
description: Finn has a toothache, so he has to go to the dentist.

name: The Cooler
description: Flame Princess asks Princess Bubblegum for help when her city is cooled down.

name: The Pajama War
description: A slumber party is being held in the Candy Kingdom and Finn and Princess Bubblegum are sent to 7 minutes in Heaven.

name: Evergreen
description: Set in the Prehistoric Era, Evergreen and his apprentice Gunter have to stop a comet heading towards Earth.

name: Astral Plane
description: Finn and Jake go camping in the woods. When they go to sleep, Finn has an out-of-body experience and visits other creatures all around Ooo while he slowly ascends to space.

name: Gold Stars
description: During his first day of school, Sweet Pea is approached by the King of OOO and his companion, Toronto, who lure him into dancing in public.

name: The Visitors
description: Finn's dream about following a comet to its crash site reunites him with an old friend.

name: The Mountain
description: Feeling unfulfilled, both Lemongrab and Finn take an introspective journey into the Mountain of Matthew. Inside, they are faced with their desires, their fears and themselves, and must make a pivotal choice.

name: Dark Purple
description: Susan Strong and her allies infiltrate the mysterious Super Porp factory.

name: The Diary
description: Jake's son T.V. discovers a mysterious diary in the dried-up moat of the Candy Kingdom, and becomes obsessed with finding out more about the writer known only as 'B.P.'

name: Walnuts & Rain
description: Finn & Jake stumble into two different holes and meet two different fates.

name: Friends Forever
description: The Ice King struggles with the consequences of making new friends.

name: Jermaine
description: Jake meets his brother Jermaine in a dream and decides to visit him in the real world.

name: Chips and Ice Cream
description: BMO'S favorite artists find a new home in the treehouse.

name: Graybles 1000+
description: Cuber returns for the telling of another installment of the Graybles.

name: Hoots
description: A charismatic stranger in Finn's dream leads Cosmic Owl to shirk his duties.

name: Water Park Prank
description: Finn and Jake enjoy a day at the water park.

name: You Forgot Your Floatin' Tent
description: A fed up Lumpy Space Princess leaves the woods for a glamorous career in babysitting.

name: Be Sweet
description: A fed up Lumpy Space Princess leaves the woods for a glamorous career in babysitting.

name: Orgalorg
description: Gunther experiences strange visions following a walrus race accident.

name: On the Lam
description: Finn's father, Martin the Human, fights for freedom on a new planet.

name: Hot Diggity Doom
description: Princess Bubblegum's attention is diverted by a mysterious presence in the sky.

name: The Comet
description: Finn, Jake, and Orgalorg converge with the comet and meet their destiny.

name: Bonnibel and Neddy
description: The greed of the King of Ooo leads to a crisis in the Candy Kingdom, and (ex-) Princess Bubblegum has to return briefly from exile to deal with it.

name: Varmints
description: Marceline and Bubblegum rekindle an old friendship while fighting off some varmints.

name: Cherry Cream Soda
description: The arrival of a visitor causes Cherry Cream Soda's life to fall flat.

name: Mama Said
description: Finn and Jake's loyalty is questioned when King of Ooo sends the duo on a mission to catch flying mushrooms.

name: Football
description: BMO switches places with his reflection, Football.

name: Stakes Part 1: Marcel ine the Vampire Queen
description: Finn and Jake hunt a shadowy predator and Marceline asks Princess Bubblegum for a favor.

name: Stakes Part 2: Everything Stays
description: As the sun rises on her last day, Marceline recalls her long extraordinary life.

name: Stakes Part 3: Vamps About
description: Five foes from Marceline's past come back to cause trouble for the land of Ooo.

name: Stakes Part 4: The Empress' Eyes
description: The empress seeks her revenge and uses the Ice King as her puppet. Marceline retaliates and gets her own vengeance.

name: Stakes Part 5: May I Come In?
description: Marceline, Bonnibel, Finn, Jake and Lumpy Space Princess fight a more traditional vampire, The Hierophant.

name: Stakes Part 6: Take Her Back
description: Princess Bubblegum searches for a cure for Marceline and Finn and Jake battle a vampire.

name: Stakes Part 7: Checkmate
description: Marceline's archenemy visits and makes an odd proposal right before battle.

name: Stakes Part 8: The Dark Cloud
description: Following the release of the Vampire King's Vampuric essence, Finn, Jake, and Princess Bubblegum are forced into a fight against the seemingly unstoppable force without the aid of a depressed Marceline.

name: The More You Moe, the Moe You Know
description: On BMO's birthday, Moe comes to visit and give BMO a special birthday mission. But while BMO is away, Moe begins to overstay his welcome at the tree house.

name: The More You Moe, the Moe You Know Part 2
description: BMO continues its quest to adulthood. It'll discover that something went wrong in the factory where all the MOs where created.

name: Summer Showers
description: Jake's Daughter, Viola helps LSP with her play, Summer Showers.

name: Angel Face
description: BMO creates a live action role-play bounty mission and sets out with Jake as his steed to capture the infamous 'Jack Rabbit Johnson'.

name: President Porpoise is Missing!
description: When Jake's video chat buddy goes missing, he must go look for him with Finn in Banana Man's submarine.

name: Blank Eyed Girl
description: A radio program broadcasts the most strange news, a blank eyed girl is going around scaring the inhabitants of Kandy Kingdom. Beware of the Blank Eyed Girl, it's coming for you.

name: Bad Jubies
description: Finn, Jake, LSP and BMO must contend with some deadly weather.

name: A King's Ransom
description: Ice King suffers a heartbreaking loss and it's up to Finn and Jake to find the culprit.

name: Scamps
description: A King's Ransom: Ice King suffers a heartbreaking loss and it's up to Finn and Jake to find the culprit. / Scamps: Finn takes a group of at-risk Candy Kingdom youth on a camping trip they'll never forget.

name: Crossover
description: Due to a prior wish Finn asked Prismo to make, Finn must now stop another dimension's version of himself and an old villain from destroying the entire multiverse.

name: Hall of Egress
description: Finn enters a mysterious dungeon and struggles to find a way out and back to Jake.

name: Flute Spell
description: With it being rumoured that Finn is seeing someone new, Jake endeavours to find out who.

name: The Thin Yellow Line
description: Finn and Jake infiltrate the Banana Guard ranks and stumble upon a conspiracy.

name: Broke His Crown
description: Ice King has some problems with his crown. Princess Bubblegum helps along with Marceline.

name: Don't Look
description: At the library, Finn learns of a mountain with treasure possessing transformative properties at its peak. He and Jake venture to find the treasure, but find more than they expected when they encounter the hermit guarding the treasure.

name: Beyond the Grotto
description: In pursuit of a runaway Sea Lard, Finn and Jake are led down a whirlpool to a curious new land.

name: Lady Rainicorn of the Crystal Dimension
description: T.V., still living with his mother, discovers a magical object and without knowing, attracts Lee - a rainicorn from the Crystal Dimension, which reveals an important part of Lady Rainicorn's past.

name: I Am a Sword
description: Fin loses his Fin-Sword and he needs to get it back ASAP, because someone is using it to cause terror and rampage.

name: Bun Bun
description: Princess Bubblegum feels sad that Cinnamon Bun is the only candy person in the Flame Kingdom, so she creates Bun Bun, a tiny cinnamon bun, to keep him company.

name: Normal Man
description: Stripped of his magic powers, Normal Man enlists Finn and Jake's help to rescue his brother Glob.

name: Elemental
description: Ice King discovers something buried deep beneath the Ice Kingdom that could change Ooo forever.

name: Five Short Tables
description: Fionna and Cake go on an adventure to push the art of cake to another level.

name: The Music Hole
description: Finn gets to be the judge of battle of the bands held in the Candy Kingdom, when he starts to hear music that nobody else can.

name: Daddy-Daughter Card Wars
description: Daddy-Daughter Card Wars: To put his embarrassing past behind him, Jake needs his daughter Charlie's help to win an underground Card Wars tourney.

name: Preboot
description: While searching for old human artifacts, Jake, Finn, and Susan Strong meet Tiffany, who is employed by a mysterious Doctor Gross.

name: Reboot
description: After Susan Strong's chip is activated, she goes rogue and attacks Finn.

name: Two Swords
description: Finn and Jake puzzle over the nature of a mysterious newcomer.

name: Do No Harm
description: Doctor Princess thrusts a great responsibility upon Finn. Jake goes adventuring with a new friend.

name: Wheels
description: Kim Kil Whan seeks Jake's assistance with his daughter's detachment from school. Jake gets distracted by something else instead.

name: High Strangeness
description: Tree Trunks receives a strange visitor who reacquaints her with some family members. Tensions flare between her and Princess Bubblegum.

name: Horse and Ball
description: James Baxter takes his turn to showcase his backstory through an interesting collage of flashbacks brought on by his famous Ball being popped.

name: Jelly Beans Have Power
description: Princess Bubblegum explores her new candy powers.

name: Islands Part 1: The Invitation
description: Consequences regarding Susan's last sent message appear at the Candy Kingdom's shore, bringing about new questions and mysteries leading Finn, Jake and Susan to embark on a new adventure.

name: Islands Part 2: Whipple the Happy Dragon
description: After a mysterious craft lands in Ooo, Finn, Jake, Susan Strong, set sail for the Island that it originated, hoping to learn the truth about the past and what happened to the humans.

name: Islands Part 3: Mysterious Island
description: After waking up alone and shipwrecked, Finn investigates a bizarre island in search of his friends.

name: Islands Part 4: Imaginary Resources
description: Finn and Jake find BMO, who is enjoying newfound fame and popularity in a new land.

name: Islands Part 5: Hide and Seek
description: Susan strong has flashbacks to her life when she was younger, and starts remembering who she actually is.

name: Islands Part 6: Min and Marty
description: Susan drops a big surprise on Finn and questions about his past are answered.

name: Islands Part 7: Helpers
description: Finn finally finds what he was looking for but things are not the way he expected them to be. Susan sees someone from her past life.

name: Islands Part 8: The Light Cloud
description: Finn decides to leave the island and tries to get everyone else to come with him as well.

name: Orb
description: During the journey home from their sea-faring adventure; Finn, Jake, and BMO encounter a mysterious force that enters their dreams.

name: Elements Part 1: Skyhooks
description: Finn, Jake, and BMO return from their voyage to a radically changed Ooo.

name: Elements Part 2: Bespoken For
description: The friends learn the story of what happened to Ooo, while Betty continues her attempt to reach Simon, but she's interrupted by someone out to steal her magic.

name: Elements Part 3: Winter Light
description: Finn, Jake and Ice King break into the Ice World to confront the power-hungry evildoer responsible for the chaos in Ooo and try to rescue Betty.

name: Elements Part 4: Cloudy
description: After taking a nap, Finn and Jake get separated from Betty and the Ice King. They need to get back and Jake needs to go pee.

name: Elements Part 5: Slime Central
description: In order to save Ooo, Finn and Jake must gather the four elemental gems. They go to the Slime Kingdom and have to gather Slime Princess's gem.

name: Elements Part 6: Happy Warrior
description: After gathering the Slime jewel, Finn and LSP go to the Fire Kingdom, to gather the Flame Jewel. Everything has turned even hotter than before.

name: Elements Part 7: Hero Heart
description: After going to the Fire Kingdom, Finn becomes taken over by fire. LSP has to save him before he destroys the candy kingdom.

name: Elements Part 8: Skyhooks II
description: After saving Finn the human during a battle between the candy kingdom and the fire kingdom it is discovered that LSP is made of anti-elemental magic and restores Ooo to it's former state.

name: Abstract
description: Jake struggles through the personal changes happening to him as a mysterious encounter in a dream with his brother Jermaine begins to haunt him.

name: Ketchup
description: BMO and Marceline play catch up on recent events.

name: Fionna and Cake and Fionna
description: While performing a reading of 'Fiona and Cake', Ice King is confronted by a familiar figure.

name: Whispers
description: While safeguarding a frightened Sweet P, Finn is led into a confrontation with an old foe.

name: Three Buckets
description: Finn and Fern's carefree visit to some old ruins turns disastrous.

name: The Wild Hunt
description: A fierce creature is terrorizing the Candy Kingdom but before Finn can slay the beast, he must first overcome a guilty conscience.

name: Always BMO Closing
description: BMO and Ice King hit the road as door-to-door salesmen and stumble upon an irresistible opportunity.

name: Son of Rap Bear
description: When Flame Princess is coaxed into a high stakes battle against the indomitable Son of Rap Bear, Finn must help her search for a new strategy.

name: Bonnibel Bubblegum
description: A long lost artifact causes Princess Bubblegum to go back to the creation of the Candy Kingdom.

name: Seventeen
description: A mysterious knight crashes Finn's birthday bash and presents him with a dangerous gift.

name: Ring of Fire
description: When an old flame comes calling on urgent business, Tree Trunks reconsiders both her wild past and her tranquil present.

name: Marcy & Hunson
description: After helping with the creation of a new sword, Hunson Abadeer comes back to try and regain his daughter's love.

name: The First Investigation
description: Finn and Jake are tasked with investigating reports of a haunting at Joshua and Margaret's old office.

name: Blenanas
description: Finn's latest literary work meets with only derision, so he sets out to prove all the naysayers wrong.n

name: Jake the Starchild
description: In order to fulfill his grand destiny, Jake is spirited away by a strangely familiar shape-shifting alien.

name: Temple of Mars
description: Searching for answers on Mars, Finn and Jermaine discover that they must first survive a cunning Martian mental trap.

name: Gumbaldia
description: Finn and Jake, as ambassadors of the Candy Kingdom, travel to a powerful new city-state in a last ditch effort to stave off war.

name: Diamonds and Lemons
description: special chapter with a minecraft theme

name: Come Along With Me
description: BMO narrates 'The Great Gum War' in which Finn, Jake, Marceline, PB and the Candy Kingdom go to war against Gumbald and his army that will determine the fate of Ooo once and for all.
